backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages a photo gallery app with CRUD operations for Gallery and Image entities, using blob storage for images and in-memory Maps for persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the production deployment feature to its associated files, components, and test IDs for the Internet Computer environment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing component responsibilities and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Brilliant Coaching Centre app, setting metadata, theme color, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and LanguageProvider, composing all page sections and utility components in order.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Us section displaying four feature cards (Concept Clarity, Personal Care, Discipline, Exam Preparation) with icons and bilingual text support.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionForm.ts: Admission enquiry form that collects student name, class, subject, and mobile number, then redirects to a pre-filled WhatsApp message on submission with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section showing address, phone, and WhatsApp info cards with clickable actions, plus an embedded Google Maps iframe for the Puabagan, Bankura location.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays a 'Courses Offered' section with three course cards (LKG–IV, V–X, XI–XII) showing icons, subjects, and descriptions, with bilingual English/Bengali support.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat with the coaching centre's number when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the centre's logo, tagline, contact info, social media links (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp), and a watermark background logo.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Photo gallery component combining static images with backend-stored images, supporting lightbox viewing, image upload with progress tracking, and image deletion via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section displaying the centre's logo, name, tagline (Education/Discipline/Success), and a WhatsApp admission enquiry CTA button with animated background elements.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Fixed toggle button in the top-right corner that switches the site language between English and Bengali using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/StudentDashboard: Displays a 'Coming Soon' student dashboard section previewing three upcoming features: notes/test results, login system, and attendance records.
frontend/src/components/SubmitReview.tsx: Form component allowing students to submit a review with name, class/year, subjects, star rating, and written feedback, with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx: Renders a 'Our Teachers' section displaying a grid of three teacher cards with avatar, name, classes, subjects, experience, and focus points, supporting English/Bengali language switching.
frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Renders a 'Testimonials' section with a title, intro text, and a blank-state message indicating no reviews yet, with English/Bengali language support.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Renders a 'Why Choose Us' section displaying five benefit cards (experienced teachers, small batches, regular tests, friendly environment, affordable fees) with icons and bilingual text.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for English/Bengali language toggling, persisting the selected language in sessionStorage and exposing a translation helper function `t`.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for gallery CRUD operations (fetch all galleries, fetch images by gallery, create gallery, add image, delete image) against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a dark-themed design system using OKLCH color variables (gold/maroon palette) with custom utility classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based custom colors (gold, maroon, chart, sidebar), custom fonts (Inter/Poppins), border radii, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'Brilliant Coaching Centre' tracking schema version, existing features, and deployment status on the Internet Computer.
